TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendCellColumn extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea
Public Class LegendCellColumn Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IChartMapArea
type LegendCellColumn = class inherit ChartNamedElement interface IChartMapArea

summary.span: 表示圖例中的資料格資料行，用來擴充預設圖例的功能。

span.span: Represents a cell column in a legend, which is used to extend the functionality of the default legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任意數目的資料格資料行可以放在任何順序排列，這可讓您彈性地擴充預設圖例項目的能力。Any number of cell columns can be placed in any order, which gives you the flexibility to extend the abilities of the default legend entries. 圖例資料格資料行僅適用於從數列或資料點時，會自動產生的項目。The legend cell columns are only applicable to items that are automatically generated from series or data points.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格資料行型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend cell column type.

value.span: 列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value.

value.span: 這個值表示此型別將用來定義圖例資料格資料行內容。

span.span: This value represents the type that will be used to define the legend cell column contents.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定將會顯示在每個個別的圖例資料格資料行的內容類型。This property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell column. 有兩個可能值：There are two possible values: - 文字： 根據預設，#LEGENDTEXT 關鍵字用來放置中每個資料格資料行的值。Text: By default, the #LEGENDTEXT keyword is used to place the value in each cell column. 不過，您可以使用屬性來設定將會由對應數列的值取代任何關鍵字。However, you can use the property to set any keyword(s) that will be replaced by a value of the corresponding series. - 在 [seriessymbol]: 圖例資料格會包含數列符號，例如矩形、 線條、 線條與標記或標記，其對應數列的填滿色彩相同。SeriesSymbol: The legend cell will contain a series symbol, such as a rectangle, line, line with marker, or marker, of the same fill color as its corresponding series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性時，才適用設定為，以及`string`值定義為屬性。This property is only applicable when the is set to , and a `string` value is defined for the property. 您可以使用屬性來設定圖例資料格資料行的字型屬性。You can use the property to set font properties of the legend cell column. 如果您嘗試變更這個屬性物件在執行階段，就會發生編譯錯誤。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在執行階段設定字型屬性，您必須建立新物件。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object.

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格資料行的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the legend cell column.

value.span: 值，表示圖例資料格資料行的文字。

span.span: A value that represents the text for the legend cell column.

value.span: 預設值為零長度字串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性才適用如果設為。This property is only applicable if the is set to .

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.KeywordsStringEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格資料行的工具提示文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell column.

value.span: 值，表示圖例資料格資料行的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell column.

value.span: 預設值為零長度字串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**若要以這種方式，建立影像地圖屬性物件必須設為。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 您可使用二進位資料流時，建立影像地圖，但必須使用另一種技術。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 如果`ToolTip`屬性設定的圖例項目和圖例資料格時，圖例資料格屬性的優先順序。If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence. 這屬性可讓您設定要顯示不同類型的圖表相關資料的特殊關鍵字。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要建立具有使用者定義的座標的影像對應，請使用屬性的根物件。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.KeywordsStringEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定圖例資料格資料行的 URL 目標，這個目標是從數列或資料點自動產生。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL target of the legend cell columns automatically generated from a series or data point.

value.span: 值，表示圖表項目的目的 URL 或錨點。

span.span: A value that represents the destination URL or anchor point of the chart element.

value.span: 若要使用絕對 URL，字串運算式的開頭請使用 "http://" 或 "www."。

span.span: To use an absolute URL start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.".

value.span: 如果字串的開頭不是上述其中一個前置詞，則會將字串視為相對 URL。

span.span: If the string does not start with either of these prefixes it will be treated as a relative URL.

value.span: 預設值為零長度字串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定這個屬性時，將會自動建立用戶端影像地圖。If you set this property, a client-side image map will be automatically created. 對應區域也會建立以 Href 屬性設定為指定的錨點或 URL。A map area will also be created with its Href attribute set to the specified anchor or URL. 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. 屬性的對應區域中，例如，目標 = _blank，可以使用來自指定屬性。Attributes of the map area(s), for example, target=_blank, can be specified by using the property. 屬性可讓您設定要顯示不同類型的圖表相關資料的特殊關鍵字。The property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要建立具有使用者定義的座標的影像對應，請使用屬性的根物件。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.
